CustomField.formula: IF($User.Id = User__r.Id, IF( (ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Self Assessment (Employee)') || ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'In Review (Employee)')) , HYPERLINK("apex/SalesCompetencyRating?id=" & Id, "Self Assessment Tool", "_self"), 'Under Manager Review') , IF((ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Draft (Manager)') || ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Review Action Plan (Manager)') || ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Final Approval (Manager)')), HYPERLINK("apex/ManagerAssessment?id=" & Id, "Manager Assessment Tool", "_self"), 'Under Employee Review'))
CustomField.label: Assessment Tool
